name: Miracle (DogCoding Studios)
description:
Miracle

The only certain in life is death, it is cruel and hopeless. However, what if a miracle happens?

How far would you go for someone you love? That's what Jeremy is about to find out

Controlling

Move - WASD or Arrows

Interact - Spacebar or Z

Made in 7 days for MageJam 2022 Version 1.0.1

We fixed some bugs and added a low graphics version for low-end PCs
